message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to let it go for $9000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $7250?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, but I need to make a profit. Would you be open to discussing this price point?

I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to keep my budget in check. Would you be willing to meet me at $6000? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can come to an agreement at this price.

I understand you're trying to keep your budget in check, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going as low as $6000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our last discussion, so I'm offering the product to you for $7000. This is my final compromise, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.

I'm really interested in the product, but I've already stretched my budget as far as I can. I'm willing to go up to $6500, but that's the absolute maximum I can afford. I'm hoping we can meet at this price and finalize the deal.
